WorkItem.ClosedComment: The MSI should just work. Are you seeing any problems? Please reopen with details if so. Thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
When will the Visual Studio extension be available for the new Visual Studio 2013 preview?
Or is there some workaround to get the VS2012 extension working with VS2013?

Comments.Message:
Indeed. After re-installing the 0.9.0.1 VS2012 extension and rebooting Windows, all TypeScript features were visible in the VS2013 Preview.

Can you please update the [extension download section](http://www.typescriptlang.org/#Download) and [page](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=34790) with some extra text pointing out that the VS2012 extension also works for the VS2013 Preview? Because it isn't mentioned anywhere.

I used the 2012 MSI to install typescript on Visual Studio 2013 preview. It does not work!

I rebooted and none of the typescript features are present?

Can you help
Please log a separate issue with some information in it so we can help diagnose what's going on. Thanks!
